project.name: C-C674A-SUBV-07-ST03-DT07-DF14-CF24-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C674A-SUBV-07-ST03-DT07-DF14-CF24-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Read a string from the input. Get the first character of the string, and then search the string for another instance of that first character.If the character does not appear, go into uncontrolled recursion.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="asdfasdf" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C674A-SUBV-07-ST03-DT07-DF14-CF24-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Read a string from the input. Get the first character of the string, and then search the string for another instance of that first character.If the character does not appear, go into uncontrolled recursion.

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="this string has an another t" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
